website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet attractive lamp in a smaller size that offers quality and style.
pros: Outlet in the base makes it convenient to plug in a charger or alarm clock
Smaller size and clean design make it versatile enough for any space
cons: A few consumers have reported receiving non-working lamps

customer_reviews.title: Cute lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so cute! It looks great and is the perfect height. It is also very true to color. I took a pic with the light on and off so that you can see the actual color.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp and the color. The price is great, and about the same, at every store you look. I find more color options here on Amazon though. Some people don’t like the ball chain as the switch, but this one is very light and easy to pull, unlike an older stick lamp I have. Very convenient to have a plug as well. I prefer to use 60 watt bulbs in these. The darker the shade, the less amount of light that will go through. Keep that in mind. Mine is teal color and still lights up my room pretty well with just one. Mine had no damages, very well packaged. I’m a happy primer :)
customer_reviews.author: Prime-azing Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great but short cord
customer_reviews.text: Most cheap lamps are only 40 watts; this is 60. This means that no matter how much darker the shade you'll still get good light. The charging plug is nice. MAJOR PROBLEM IS ABSURDLY SHORT CORD. It's not a damned hair dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: Shop around the Clock

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look! However, I understood that the power outlet on the lamp base was a USB port for a smartphone (my bad!) but it’s an outlet for a two pronged plug. Also, as some have mentioned, the lamp shade sits on top but isn’t secured, so it moves quite freely. My biggest complaint is that the pull-chain is really hard to pull! I sprayed some graphite in the opening and that seemed to help, and hopefully it will loosen a bit over time. Overall, I’m very pleased with this purchase ! (I have no idea why my pics loaded sideways!)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mac

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS EASY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely horrible. If you spill even a tiny bit of water on it the stain will last forever. This is super dark and not very good. I put my led lightbulb in and it was a struggle. The outlet does work but isn't easy to put plugs in. It looks really gross and I'm not satisfied. It bends towards the bulb VERY EASY. Its super fragile and sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sharp style
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as a bedside lamp. Assembly was simple: remove protective plastic, place shade, screw in bulb. The receptacle on the lamp base is perfect for keeping electronics chargers handy. Lamp's pull cord is smooth. Lamp shade sits on the base where the bulb is screwed in, but isn't fastened down and remains shaky. Not a problem unless you're constantly bumping into your lamp. Lamp shade itself is well made; outer colored fabric is even textured with rich color. Nice stylish little lamp, great value.
customer_reviews.author: superM

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp,  but customer service is even better!
customer_reviews.text: This teal lamp is beautiful, and I particularly love that there is a plug in the base of the lamp for my desk. I had to write their customer service team because my lamp arrived with a damaged pull cord. They were quick to respond, quickly sent me replacement parts, and it works perfectly now and looks even better than it did when it arrived. Great experience, and I would totally buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Renee H.

customer_reviews.title: Is Not Level
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I saw this lamp on here because it perfectly matches my daughters new room and bed set. It arrived and I was not yet moved into the new place so I wanted to take it out of the box until we were moved in and ready for it. I put it up tonight and the lamp is completely unlevel. The bottom of the lamp is messed up and it clearly leans to one side. I don't know if the padding is messed up or if the wiring underneath is making it uneven, but I am very upset. It is an imperfection to my daughters newly put together room.
customer_reviews.author: Shelberpuss

customer_reviews.title: Luv these lamps brighten up any room
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp bought it in pink as well as teal surpingly the pink one is a tad bit larger lamp shade wise both are in my bedroom was hoping all colors would be same size no biggy though BOTH lamps DO HAVE A PLUG a extra power source which I enjoy. VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE they arrived so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Valerie_105

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, weak, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews. But...The lamp arrived broken and bent. The shade falls right through what is suppose hold it. So no sure if it was supposed to be 1 piece and its broken, not welded right, or if they sent the wrong pieces. But it surely doesn't work. The shade is very weak, just look elsewhere if you need it soon. I ordered it for college dorm, and now wont be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Esterabeja

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, stylish and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters room when we were redecorating. Since one of her colors was a teal/turquoise, we went with this style. It's easy to set up/use. She really likes that it has the additional power outlet on the base of the lamp so that she can put her phone/tablet charger there without having to run cords down behind her desk. She has this one plugged into a smart plug so that it can be controlled by the Alexa and we've had no issues with that. It's well made, sturdy and should last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa KTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Light Flickers In and Out
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the light when we first got it. We've been using it for a month or so and now it keeps flickering in and out. We have to wiggle the lamp or turn it off and then back on a couple times for it to stay on. Stinks because I really did like it, but it turning off in the middle of the night while I'm trying to change a dirty diaper is not ideal. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Annoying adhesive stickers
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and just what I wanted, but I’m taking a star off for the packaging — ie, the TWO stickers plastered to the base. This could’ve easily been made “frustration free” by not having those stickers there. Attach them with a string to the base if it’s crucial info — whatever. Just anything else. Now I’m left with a bunch of sticky adhesive instead of a nice shiny base.
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, but.......
customer_reviews.text: It wobbles like a weeble. On this lamp the foam underside is stuck on crooked and the electric parts bulge slightly on the bottom. It wobbles, doesn't stand flat. Eventually I'll fix it myself. Other than that it is a nice lamp. Looks good, and lights up well. I have a 40 watt bulb and I could read by it if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkal

customer_reviews.title: Received Two different colored Lamp Shades
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Teal Lamps and received one teal and one light green. You would think that they could clearly see the difference in the colors. The light green shade also had what look like ink marks on it. Returning and waiting on a replacement. My review is based on what I received. The one Teal lamp(dark one) I received is pretty and the color I need.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Shade loose, no proper way to attach to lamp
customer_reviews.text: The shade does not stay level or attach properly. The lamp part it self is also not straight which makes it even worse that the shade does not fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's pretty and the parts seem sturdy. The shade is just the color and thickness I was looking for, the only con to me was the plug in it ... It doesn't fit a USB nor does it fit a regular 120 v plug.. so what is it ?? Basically a useless addition. Otherwise, very happy with it, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these lamps I have bought. First had the red one for my son's room and now purchased the teal one for my daughter. I love the plug in on the lamp itself. It is so convenient for plugging in their clocks for now and I'm sure all their gadgets when they are older. Such great quality and not expensive at all. I have had the red one for over 2 years and never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!  Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these lamps! Bought one for my room and one for my sons room. Love the charger plug on the base. Very clever and super handy! Great purchasing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Remodeling momma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dark teal lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a plug in on it. Make sure you have a bulb for it tho, I use a really bright 60 watt bulb and it looks very nice in my room. The pull switch is a little harder to pull that I expected but it's not that bad. Definitely glad i purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Jarica Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Affordable! Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Its the perfect size, color and super easy assembly. Also plus side its got an outlet so I can charge my phone in it. The price is so affordable. I've looked and so many lamps are over priced its stupid. But not this gem. Get it if your looking for something simple yet stylish and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, pull chain, not USB outlet
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, has normal plug outlet on base NOT a USB outlet for those wondering, so you can plug various things/brands directly into this while sitting at your desk rather then searching for an outlet and having to worry about the cord not reaching where you are sitting. Perfect size for any desk. Love that it has a pull chain to turn on and off. I purchased the teal to match my daughters room colors and she loves!! Very practical for teens!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little lamp! Only complaints are 1) that the shade wobbles bc it is t secured in place, and 2) there was a slight dent in the base from shipping, but neither of those things really bother me. It works well, it looks nice and it was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Tyndall

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked for about 3 months. Then when I was turning it on the chain came out. Broke off. And that's the end of the lamp. No way to fix. No way to get in to see rest of chain. Too bad bc it was otherwise a nice sturdy lamp that charged my phone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in black a few years ago for my son. I’m changing the playroom to a more teen friendly bonus room. I bought 2 in teal and they look great. Bonus is they can charge their electronics on them without having them all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp! For those who posted that the shade rests on top of the bulb, you have the shade upside down. Turn it around and it fits perfectly. It's a good quality lamp. It's heavier (in a good way) than I expected. The color is great as well. It is also a little bigger than I thought, but not but much. I would consider it a medium size. Either way you will not go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who doesn't read the item details- you DO REQUIRE A LIGHTBULB. This lamp does not come with one for you. The lampshade color in person matched perfectly to the image onscreen. It does the job and fits in my office well!
customer_reviews.author: Emilyann

customer_reviews.title: Shade is a beautiful dark teal.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp fits perfectly with my decor. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is the shade is a bit wobbly once put together. I'm going to have to put putty under the ring to get it to sit level.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Match my new bed set and look great overall in my room. I purchased these mainly because they have the charging outlet. Have a small bedroom and not a lot of outlets. Before my husband and I both had to have extension cords on both sides of the bed which creates a trip hazard and a temptation for the dog to chew. Now we just need one and both lamps are plugged in. Love the look, the pull cord is just long enough for us to reach while laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Looks better online. Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Shade is floppy and terrible. Does not fit. The first shade I got was totally damaged. They replaced it with one that was only slightly damaged. Cute idea- very cheaply made and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: NINiINinINinINinININNIinINj INniNIIN JininINinininIN jNIKristine P

customer_reviews.title: Love the vibrant teal color of the shade. This lamp is the perfect size for my bedroom night table.
customer_reviews.text: I am the lover of the color teal, so this lamp caught my eye right away. I started reading the reviews and became a bit apprehensive about ordering it, based on some negative reviews.. However, I ordered it anyway. So far, I see no problems with this lamp, and hopefully I won't.
customer_reviews.author: Markita Twain

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely. And I used it as an extension ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely. And I used it as an extension cord (essentially) when drilling holes to put up my curtains, lol. Some quick thinking on my part. Now I just need to see if I can find that incredibly specific light bulb that goes with it! I will likely get another one of these for the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Barlow

customer_reviews.title: A fine product From Good Old China -
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is just ok. I feel the price is a little high ,for what you get. My daughter had the same lamp ,a few years ago, the switch broke (The weak spot). So now you know -
customer_reviews.author: Byron  Alton

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and I love the color, just what I was looking for. I really like the chain pull, makes it easy to turn off and on, as well as the extra outlet, it is perfect to charge my phone while I am working on my crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy V Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very nice and help ever mines looks a little crooked I’m not sure why but it’s nice the base of the lamp is kind of heavy before the price it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Black

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp, it was easy to put together, I love that there is a USB charger in it that works, it just isn't quite as bright as I would have liked. I wanted to be able to turn off my overhead lights and just use the lamp for evening lighting while watching TV, but it's a little darker than I prefer with just the lamp on. But it is super cute and accents my living room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: The best lamp I ever purchased and I love that I can charge my phone with it .was worried about the price and how cheap it was but literally best purchase ever !
customer_reviews.author: Constance Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: It is used as extra light on my desk. I only have it 4 stars instead of 5 because it came with a slight lean to the stem. Because of where I have it, it does not show too much, so did not return.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office desk. Have to laugh at myself, as I was putting it together, I put the shade on upside down and was like "why did they make this shade so small, you can see the bulb sticking out the top?" haha blonde moment!!! Turn it right side up and it was like magic!!! :) Love the plug on it and the pull string!
customer_reviews.author: Alysa Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Good but on the cheap side.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. My only complaint is that the slightest ding shows clearly on the lit shade. I can live with it. The lamps are fine for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara1212

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp (teal shade) for my son's room. I wanted a small bedside lamp that my son could easily switch on. This lamp fit the bill. It's small, doesn't take up much table space. The chain pull makes it easy for my son to turn it on and off. It also looks good by his bedside.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Plug not USB port and bulb not fitting right
customer_reviews.text: Nice colour. Found lamp a bit small and flimsy. The base has a plug not a USB port as I had assumed. The bulb does not screw in properly and the shade is therefore very wobbly. I’ve tried LED and fluorescent bulbs and plan to see if a different brand will fit better
customer_reviews.author: MRodz

customer_reviews.title: Love It!💜
customer_reviews.text: It's EXACTLY what I wanted and it matches Perfectly with the color scheme in our guest bedroom. It is Very Pretty and I Am Well Pleased!🥰
customer_reviews.author: Camille a.ka. SEXYCapricorn

customer_reviews.title: Love the pull chain.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sleek. Shade is a nice pop of color. Good quality. Pull chain eliminates need to search under shade for the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: LetC

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my 7 year old daughters room and she LOVES it. the color is perfect and it has a plug on it. we put the light changing Light bulb that is compatable with the echo dot/Alexa and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Moya

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my home office
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is perfect for an end table in my home office. My daughters come over, plug in their computers, and work comfortably on my office couch.
customer_reviews.author: Momi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nightstand Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is perfect for my toddler's room. The pull chain is easy for her to use and the charging outlet works great. It arrived in perfect condition and is much nicer (and more affordable) than all of the ones I looked at in the stores. My husband and I love it so much that we are going to purchase 3 more: 2 for our nightstands and 1 for the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Mine seems to be missing a part
customer_reviews.text: I like the cheerful turquoise color, the convenience of the built-in power source (one can never have too many outlets with all the devices that need charging!), and the simple, sleek design. It works well on a nightstand. Mine seems to be missing a part because the lamp shade isn't secure, though (it rocks from side to side when bumped).
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap lamps, packaging needs work.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two, as you can see the packaging doesn’t protect them very well. Fortunately we were able to carefully reshape the flattened one. Other than that very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryFan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I live this lamp. Super cute! I really wanted an orange one though but you guys don't make orange.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, wonderful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The color matches great, I love the pull cord light switch that seams to blend modern and retro styles. Plus it has an easily accessible electrical outlet for your charger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute lamp!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her room and loves it! It’s super cute, bright, charges your phone and I love the draw string chain you use to turn it on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Party of 6

customer_reviews.title: Great little decorative lamp for
customer_reviews.text: Cute little lamp for my daughter’s room remodel. She’s excited to charge her phone in the base. Easy to assemble and great price. Not the most amazing quality, but perfect for the price and our needs. Works great and we loved the color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tired mama

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that this lamp serves the purpose of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely lamp. I thought that the charger was going to look awful on the lamp but it does not. I like the fact that this lamp serves the purpose of an extra outlet. It is a keeper. The teal looks exactly like on the photo, unlit.
customer_reviews.author: maya provence

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute lamp for my son’s bedroom and adds just enough light. Purchased a pink one as well for my 5 year old daughter’s bedroom. It is very easy for her to turn it on rather than the other lamps.
customer_reviews.author: John Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Lights
customer_reviews.text: Good color, matches perfectly. However thought the plug on it was a usb plug, not just another regular plug. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: Onlythebest

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful lamp
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her new lamp! The color is so pretty and at night, it puts off a colorful glow. She enjoys the charging port most because she can now easily play on her tablet while it’s charging. Great lamp for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Very high end looking at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: What a great surprise this lamp is! It looks very high end at a great price. Well made and lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Mulder Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These small lamps are just right for a bedside table. I also like the convenience of the plug at the base of the lamp for my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: ci

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! I got it for my office and it is perfect. It’s a good size, great quality, and gives my office a little pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Samsarazoe

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! Great quality for the price and the colors are beautiful! Adds some color to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Clover44

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very cute lamp. Great for bedside or just to brighten a space. Color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good table lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy and love the teal color. Material is a bit thin and therefore see-through but overall it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: JUJU

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product I couldn't figure out how to put get together at first but once I figured it out it was great
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer korloch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my desk at work - really works great. And I love the plug in on the base - now I can plug my charger in and charge my phone on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chekas125

customer_reviews.title: Best part is it takes standard bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Daughter chose this for her room. After using it she says it works really well. She charges her phone using the two prone outlet on the base. Best part is it takes standard bulbs. So no expensive fancy bulbs to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Fav lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute! Took them out the box added shade from the box. Put in bulb, plugged in! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: VANNDALZ

customer_reviews.title: okayish lamp for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the lamp, the thing to switch on and off the lamp dint work. I did get a replacement from amazon but it was disappointing. The color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lilesh Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Light Up Your Life
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for each nightstand along the side of my bed. Love the way they look but the shades are flimsey and is only in place because of the lightbulb. Otherwise, they're awesome and add a great accent to the room's color theme.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long - pull string
customer_reviews.text: Cute lamp for side table in room BUT the pull string broke 🙄 Not kid friendly!
customer_reviews.author: lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Shade is loose
customer_reviews.text: I like the lamp, but the shade is not secure. Otherwise it is a pretty lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not sure. It came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give an honest review because the lamp came damaged. I guess I could say it’s flimsy and not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: They are just perfect for my spare room in my new house. Color is great, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Connee Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good lamp for our daughters room for a large night light
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barga

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute — excited to use in my classroom! The design is great and the color “pops!” Functionality and quality wise, not sure yet, but love the design, quality, and extra charging feature.
customer_reviews.author: JorP

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that my guest can plug their phones ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that my guest can plug their phones without having to look for a plug in back of the bed
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Fell apart into pieces in less than 24 hours. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: amartin8605

customer_reviews.title: I had shade upside down. Bulb fits/works fine
customer_reviews.text: No light bulbs fit!correction... my bad. I had the lampshade on upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Small enough to fit on the dresser
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Small enough to fit on the dresser. I love the pull chain operation. Haven't used the plug on the base, but I like knowing it's there if I need it. All in all, pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Squeak

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used a plug-in spot on it but it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my eleven year old granddaughter. When I received it I was blown away by the cuteness of it. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my den. I like that it has an outlet on the base.
customer_reviews.author: LKQH

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great little light for the money! Love the outlet on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print open-box means damaged not working broken
customer_reviews.text: I was stupid and tried to save a couple dollars the advertisement for the product saud open box perfect condition now they want me to jump through hoops to replace them they arrived broken not working and very beat up I thought one of them worked originally but it doesn't work either it shorted out almost caused a fire in my home I threw them away
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hasson

customer_reviews.title: And less than $20
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this inexpensive lamp that matched the rug we just bought for our spare bedroom. The on/off pull chain is great for the bedside and the plugin on the base is a spare outlet & convenient for charging phones and so many other things.
customer_reviews.author: true grit

customer_reviews.title: Might be missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn't come with the inner lock ring so shade always wobbles. But I'm still using it.
customer_reviews.author: E Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy pull chains, and the light is sufficient for my use at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Madge F. Zanolini

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: You won’t be disappointed. I installed LED bulbs for the pure white aspect and like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all parts are present.
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the lamp itself quality and all is great for the price but I have to be missing a piece the bulbs sits above the lamp shade and there is nothing holding the shade on it's just sitting there. See pictures. Besides that the lamp is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rios

customer_reviews.title: Lamp was perfect for my daughter’s bedside table
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was perfect for my daughter’s bedside table. Just the right size and has a USB port for her phone/electronic devices. Color was exactly as shown in picture and plenty of light for her to read.
customer_reviews.author: Cape

customer_reviews.title: Matches exactly
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This is my 3rd purchase. The color of the lamp shade matches my decor exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a great accent light for the grandkids room. Love that it has a phone charger port.
customer_reviews.author: vidguy

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is a perfect accent to my daughters room
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is a perfect accent to my daughters room. She is able to keep her phone or anything plugged in with the outlet in the base. The teal shade matches her spread perfectly, it is a true teal color. I am truly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Cute but really bad design
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is awful. The cover it not attached to the lamp; only sits on top of the light bulb. It slides off at the slightest bump. Save yourself the frustration of constantly straightening it and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI L SIDDOWAY

customer_reviews.title: Nice teal lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these teal lamps to make my room look like a bedroom and to brighten up the purple room a bit. I love them. FYI these lamps do not come with light bulbs you gonna need to purchase them separately. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth 🙂

customer_reviews.title: Cute efficient small lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our patio. Perfect for brightness and decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 teal lamps but Received 2 different shades.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the same lamps in shade “teal” but received 2 different shades. They’re even different sizes and material. Also one came with cracks in the shade and the other shade has a broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not to big, not to small.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my 10 yr olds room. We got the matching rug and curtains. Looks great and works great. No complaints with this one.
customer_reviews.author: T Wissner

customer_reviews.title: It a great light
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The little chain easy to find. It's very bright. Led it can stay on a lot not cost nothing. What more could you want.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Cute lamp. I love the outlet on it. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Connor

product_meta.title: Limelights LT2024-TEL Stick Brushed Steel Lamp with Charging Outlet and Fabric Shade, 19.50 x 8.50 x 8.50 inches, Teal
product_meta.description: Color:Brushed Steel/TealThis fun and fashionable lamp features a brushed steel base and a fabric shade. It comes equipped with a 2 prong outlet seated in the base for use to charge mobile phones, handheld games, tablets, and other small electronics. This lamp will add a fabulous flair to any room. Perfect for bedrooms, kids and teens, college dorms, nurseries, or fun offices!
feature_bullets: Brushed Steel base with Charging Outlet
Perfect for bedrooms, kids room, college dorm, nursery, or fun office
Uses 1 x 60W type A medium base bulb (not included)
Power Outlet on base for charging your Cell phone, iPod, iPhone, iPad
Available in additional color and buying options
